msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is badly damaged in the left side, especially along its numerous vertical folds. There is a kollesis in the middle of the document, which is regularly cut at the left and right. At top and bottom the papyrus is broken. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Left third of column is left blank. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Sarapion, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sarapion, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Petheus, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petheus, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 203)
Phaseis, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 246)
Phanomgeus, brother with the same mother (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)
Esouris, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 164)
Pnepheros, son of Petaus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus, grandson of Horion, mother Taorsenouphis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 217)
Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Psenesis, son of Parmenion, grandson of Psenesis, mother Tkonnos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Heras, son of Petsiris, grandson of Heras, mother Isidora (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 170)
Ptollas, brother with the same mother (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 221)
Agathopos, slave of Thermouthis alias Tpaieitis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 148)
Dionysios, fatherless, mother Tepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 162)
Ptolemaios, son of Papeis, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Horos, son of Harpagathes, grandson of Horos, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 249)
Petheus, son of Ptollis, grandson of Herakles, mother Thases (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 204)
Petheus, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Taelekis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 203)
Karanos, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Imouthes, mother Tapetsiris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 180)
Komon, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tkollauthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 183)
Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Heras, son of Melanas, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamystha (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 169)
Theon, son of Theon, grandson of Petheus, mother Zoidous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 177)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: " [Column 11]:;(Tybi) 10 likewise:;Sarapion, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sarapion, mother Thaesis, drachmas 18, obols 8;;12th year the same, ? copper drachmas:;Petheus, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petheus, mother Segathis, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Phaseis, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, brother with the same mother, drachmas 4;;Esouris, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Ptolema, drachmas 4, 27 obols;;Pnepheros, son of Petaus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4, 28 obols;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus, grandson of Horion, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema, drachmas 8;;Psenesis, son of Parmenion, grandson of Psenesis, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 8;;Heras, son of Petsiris, grandson of Heras, mother Isidora, drachmas 12, obols 27;;Ptollas, brother with the same mother, drachmas 20;;Agathopos, slave of Thermouthis alias Tpaieitis, drachmas 4;;Dionysios, fatherless, mother Tepheros, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Papeis, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 16;;Horos, son of Harpagathes, grandson of Horos, mother Thaesis, drachmas 12;;Petheus, son of Ptollis, grandson of Herakles, mother Thases, drachmas 4;;12th year, Petheus, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Taelekis, from Magdola, drachmas 6, 1 obol;;Karanos, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Imouthes, mother Tapetsiris, obols 28;;Komon, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tkollauthis, drachmas 4, 28 obols;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas, drachmas 8;;Heras, son of Melanas, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamystha, drachmas 8;;Theon, son of Theon, grandson of Petheus, mother Zoidous, drachmas 4 ? copper drachmas of priests;;in total for the day drachmas188, obols 23, of which 12th year drachmas 12, obols 19."
